jd: From: Sai Kumar, Flexon Technologies saikumar@flexontechnologies.com Reply to: saikumar@flexontechnologies.com Job Title: Project Manager – Global RolloutLocation: San Jose, CA (3 days onsite, hybrid model) About the Role:Client is seeking an experienced Project Manager to lead the global rollout of key initiatives across our Corporate spaces. This contractor role will focus on implementing systems and processes that enhance our Operations and Maintenance experience. The ideal candidate will have a strong background in managing complex global rollouts.Key Responsibilities:●Manage the global rollout of systems and tools, ensuring alignment with Apple’s objectives and operational needs.●Develop and maintain project plans, tracking milestones, risks, and dependencies to ensure successful implementation.●Collaborate with engineering, operations, and regional stakeholders to ensure that requirements are met and issues are promptly resolved.●Oversee data integration and system dependencies and resolve gaps before implementation●Drive process improvements, particularly around efficiencies while maintaining current timelines●Facilitate stakeholder communication, providing regular updates on project progress, risks, and issue resolution.●Ensure seamless transition post-rollout, working with operational teams to embed new tools and systems into their daily processes.●Provide training and documentation to support regional stakeholdersQualifications:●Proven experience as a Project Manager, with a strong track record of leading global rollouts or implementation.●Experience managing end-to-end project lifecycles, from planning through execution, including handling complex data dependencies.●Ability to manage multiple stakeholders across different regions and Eme zones.●Strong problem-solving and organizational skills, with the ability to handle technical challenges in real-Eme.●Excellent communication skills with experience presenting project updates to leadership andcross-functional teams.●Technical background or familiarity with system integrations is a plus.●Experience with Service Channel or similar facilities management/operations systems.●Prior experience in facilities management, operations, or corporate services within a fast paced environment.●Ability to work global hours to manage international teams and stakeholders.
